Song.title: Your Redeeming Love
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge Â© 2000 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: [E] I come boldly, [B] trusting only [F#m7] Your redeeming l[A2 |]ove, [E] Flowing freely, [B] from Your side now, [F#m7] Your atoning bl[A2 |]ood [E] Like a river, [B/D#] like a fountain, [A/C#] like a cleansing fl[A2]ood I [C#m7]pour out my [A2]worship to Y[Bsus4 |]ou For [B]Your redeeming l[E | B/E | A | A]ove
Verse 1: My gl[C#m]ory,{,} in Your [D2]cross of shame and [E]suff[Esus4 | E Esus4]'ring My gl[C#m]ory,{,} what the [D2]world disdains as [E]noth[Esus4 | Bsus4 B]ing I will gl[F#m7]ory in such [Esus4/B]foolish[E/B]ness I will gl[F#m7]ory, for it's [Esus4/B]nothing [E/B]less, Than Your [F#m7]wisdom{,} and your [E/G#]awesome pow'r, my [A2 | B |]God
Verse 2: My gl[C#m]ory,{,} in Your [D2]deep humili[E]a[Esus4 | E Esus4]tion You f[C#m]ound me,{,} and You [D2]crowned me with sal[E]va[Esus4 | Bsus4 B]tion I will [F#m7]glory, all my [Esus4/B]sin and [E/B]guilt Have been [F#m7]covered by the [Esus4/B]blood You [E/B]spilt And now I'm [F#m7]living{,} in Your [E/G#]resurrection [A2 | B |]light
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus i come boldly trusting only your redeeming love flowing freely from your side now your atoning blood like a river like a fountain like a cleansing flood i pour out my worship to you for your redeeming love verse 1 my glory in your cross of shame and suffring my glory what the world disdains as nothing i will glory in such foolishness i will glory for its nothing less than your wisdom and your awesome powr my god verse 2 my glory in your deep humiliation you found me and you crowned me with salvation i will glory all my sin and guilt have been covered by the blood you spilt and now im living in your resurrection light
